a1.DESCRIPTION: This stall sells various hazardous and experimental drugs. These have been outlawed for a reason
a1.EXAMINATION:
The man running the stall is covered in cybernetic implants,
which at a first glance have obviously been stolen from various SCP/D droids you recognise.

a2.DESCRIPTION:
The entrance to the black market.
You wonder why such an obviously illegal area has not been raided or taken down by SCP/D law 
enforcement.
a2.EXAMINATION:
Many intense and drudged looking people are entering and leaving the Black Market,
some of them look glance at you and,
likely under the assumption that you yourself are some sort of law enforcement,
scoff at your existence.

b2.DESCRIPTION: A thin walkway filled with signs and conglomerate advertisements
b2.EXAMINATION:
Many advertisements are showcasing the new Better Than Life Virtual Environment Simulation.
This only appeals to the lower class and people living in horrid situations.
Classic.

b3.DESCRIPTION: This is your apartment. It's filled with trash. You haven't decided to clean it yet.
b3.EXAMINATION: Nothing has changed about your apartment. Except you remember you should clean it someday.
